name: Motorcycle Drift Racing
description:
The world's most popular moto drift racing game!

Race with moto drivers from all over the world and climb to the throne of the championship!

The most realistic moto racing game! New gameplay: Drift, Racing, Collision! Fun motorbike speed experience, racing on the world's top track!!

Ride on the motorcycle , try to avoid hitting the track, turn to use the drift skills, let the nitrogen full, release the nitrogen, surpass the opponent, reach the end point as soon as possible! Complete the racing, get money, buy new motorcycles, and upgrade your vehicle. Customize the look of the motorcycle, replace it with your favorite body color and carefully designed textures, and design a unique style!

Moto Drift Racing Feature:

- Free for all players
-8 top-class motorcycles to choose from
- the sound of real motorcycles
- Motorcycle drift racing
- change motorbike appearance: color and texture
- Drift, racing,thrilling!
-Realistic motorbike driving
- Easy to operate, easy to use

Motorcycle drift racing and become the best moto racing game!
